subject: Golf
Wind
lead_paragraph: Bob and Jerry are playing the final hole of their club championship, tied for the lead. They each reach the green in two strokes and mark their balls, which rest on a slope about 3 feet above the hole.
snippet: Bob and Jerry are playing the final hole of their club championship, tied for the lead. They each reach the green in two strokes and mark their balls, which rest on a slope about 3 feet above the hole.
